languages.text: "Нет. Я все еще на миссии, и в ваше отсутствие я и мои подчиненные будем проверять вооружение и дорабатывать тактику штурма. Иначе говоря, полностью посвятим себя подготовке".
"No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Я все еще на миссии, и в ваше отсутствие я и мои подчиненные будем проверять вооружение и дорабатывать тактику штурма. Иначе говоря, полностью посвятим себя подготовке".

traits.locale_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."
"No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

"No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

languages.text: «No. Tengo una misión y, en su ausencia, mis subordinados y yo nos dedicaremos a comprobar nuestro armamento y detallar las tácticas para el asalto. Es decir, estaremos totalmente ocupados con los preparativos».
languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

traits.locale_text: «No. Tengo una misión y, en su ausencia, mis subordinados y yo nos dedicaremos a comprobar nuestro armamento y detallar las tácticas para el asalto. Es decir, estaremos totalmente ocupados con los preparativos».

languages.text: “恐怕不行，我还有任务在身。你不在的情况下，我和我的下属会检查武器，制定战术。换句话说，我们会把所有时间花在准备工作上。”
languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕不行，我还有任务在身。你不在的情况下，我和我的下属会检查武器，制定战术。换句话说，我们会把所有时间花在准备工作上。”

languages.text: « Non, je suis toujours en mission, et en votre absence, mes subordonnés et moi-même devrons passer en revue notre arsenal et finaliser notre stratégie avant de donner l'assaut. Autant dire que nous aurons largement de quoi nous occuper avec les préparatifs. »
languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

traits.locale_text: « Non, je suis toujours en mission, et en votre absence, mes subordonnés et moi-même devrons passer en revue notre arsenal et finaliser notre stratégie avant de donner l'assaut. Autant dire que nous aurons largement de quoi nous occuper avec les préparatifs. »

languages.text: 「いいえ。私はまだ任務中で、あなたがいなければ、部下たちとともに武器を確認し、襲撃の戦略を最終判断します。つまり、私たちは準備に専念しているのです」
languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ。私はまだ任務中で、あなたがいなければ、部下たちとともに武器を確認し、襲撃の戦略を最終判断します。つまり、私たちは準備に専念しているのです」

languages.text: "Hayır. Hâlâ vazife başındayım ve yokluğunuzda astlarımla birlikte silahları kontrol edip taarruz taktiklerini son kez gözden geçireceğiz. Bir diğer deyişle tamamen hazırlıklarla meşgul olacağız."
languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Hâlâ vazife başındayım ve yokluğunuzda astlarımla birlikte silahları kontrol edip taarruz taktiklerini son kez gözden geçireceğiz. Bir diğer deyişle tamamen hazırlıklarla meşgul olacağız."

languages.text: "Nein, ich habe eine Mission und werde in Eurer Abwesenheit mit meinen Untergebenen unsere Waffen prüfen und eine Angriffstaktik ausarbeiten. Oder anders gesagt: Ich werde mit Vorbereitungen beschäftigt sein."
languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, ich habe eine Mission und werde in Eurer Abwesenheit mit meinen Untergebenen unsere Waffen prüfen und eine Angriffstaktik ausarbeiten. Oder anders gesagt: Ich werde mit Vorbereitungen beschäftigt sein."

languages.original_text: "No. I'm still on mission, and in your absence, my subordinates and I will be checking weapons and finalising tactics for the assault. In other words, we will be wholly occupied with preparations."
